projects.Name: Restaurant
projects.Description: The Restaurant Project is a fully responsive website for a restaurant. It features an elegant design and a user-friendly interface, and it is optimized for mobile devices. It provides customers with an accessible and enjoyable way to explore the restaurant's offerings.
